text:
Hello All,

We've been running a lot lately through a scenario where the internal teams are facing an issue while trying to send sales emails from HubSpot. They are getting the following error:
"The email wasn't sent because an unsubscribe link couldn't be generated for ..."

Anybody facing this issue ? How should we deal with this ?
Hi <@U02J1440N13> I would recommend surfacing this to our in-app support people.
